Sequence Information.Source: Lens culinaris subsp. culinaris (Cultivated lentil) (Lens esculenta)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity against the phytopathogenic fungus Aspergillus niger VKM F-2259, but not against A.alternatia VKM F- 3047. Does not inhibit trypsin or chymotrypsin.

Literature.Title: A novel defensin from the lentil Lens culinaris seeds.
Literature.Author: Finkina EI, Shramova EI, Tagaev AA, Ovchinnikova TV.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of defensin Lc-def from germinated lentil (Lens Culinaris) seeds.
Literature.Author: Shenkarev Z, Mineev K, Gizatullina A, Finkina E, Arseniev A, Ovchinnikova T.
